pr_title: gl-916 add pipeline version to metrics

timeline.message: GL-916 Stubbed out adding PIPELINE_VERSION to arrays metrics.

timeline.bodyText: Given the way this class is used, I don't see why the code in setup() isn't done in the constructor directly.
timeline.author: pshapiro4broad

replies.bodyText: The code has been rewritten to not pass pipelineVersion to CollectArraysVariantCallingMetrics, so this suggestion isn't germane to the PR (and probably should be done elsewhere).
replies.author: gbggrant

timeline.message: change how we are passing PIPELINE_VERSION to metrics collector
add test to allow case when pipeline version is not set in the vcf

timeline.bodyText: I don’t think you need to update the example. I would either add an example or remove the comment. Adding a TODO should be avoided if possible.
timeline.author: pshapiro4broad
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -43,10 +43,12 @@ "

Usage example:
